CustomField.description: Defines the retention period for outbound requests in days. This setting determines how long outbound request records will be retained in the system before being automatically deleted. Note that a value of '0' or any negative number will be considered as unlimited retention, preventing automatic deletion of outbound requests.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days to retain requests. A value of '0' or any negative number means unlimited retention.
CustomField.label: Outbound requests retention period
